recipe.title: Roasted Veggie Skewers Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: 2 ; medium red onions, cut into 1-inch pieces
2 ; red bell peppers, cut into 1-inch pieces
2 ; yellow bell peppers, cut into 1-inch pieces
8 skewers ; bamboo skewer, soaked in water for 20 minutes

steps.step: Combine the oil, lemon juice, oregano, salt, and pepper, stirring until mixed.
Slide a zucchini slice down the skewer, followed by pieces of mushroom, red onion, and peppers, until there is a 1-inch gap at the top of the skewer. Brush each skewer liberally with the oil mixture.
Repeat with the remaining skewers and vegetables.
Grill the skewers for 12-18 minutes with the lid closed, flipping halfway.

steps_updated.steps_updated: Combine the oil, lemon juice, oregano, salt, and pepper, stirring until mixed.
Slide a zucchini slice down the skewer, followed by pieces of mushroom, red onion, and peppers, until there is a 1-inch gap at the top of the skewer.
Brush each skewer liberally with the oil mixture.
Repeat with the remaining skewers and vegetables.
Grill the skewers for 12-18 minutes with the lid closed, flipping halfway.
